record.field: SM-CORE-0001: Wrong date of birth for a living person
SM-CORE-0002: The HEALED date "%(healed_date)s" is BEFORE DIAGNOSED DATE "%(diagnosed_date)s"!
SM-CORE-0003: The Treatment END DATE "%(date_stop_treatment)s" is BEFORE the start date "%(date_start_treatment)s"
SM-CORE-0004: The Medication END DATE "%(end_treatment)s" is BEFORE the start date "%(start_treatment)s"!
SM-CORE-0005: The vaccine next dose is BEFORE the first one!
SM-CORE-0006: Verify and check for safety in pregnancy the prescribed drugs
SM-CORE-0007: There is no health professional associated to this user
SM-CORE-0008: End time "%(evaluation_endtime)s" BEFORE evaluation start "%(evaluation_start)s"
SM-CORE-0009: You need to select one appointment
SM-CORE-0010: The Person field must be set if the party is a health professional or a patient
SM-CORE-0011: The person can have only one official name
SM-CORE-0012: The account differs from the person federation account
SM-CORE-0013: The date on the Party differs from the certificate
SM-CORE-0014: This vaccination is at state DONE. You can no longer modify it
